headline: Accelera to Unveil Zero-Emissions Integrated Battery Electric Powertrain for Isuzu F-Series Medium-Duty Truck
summary: COLUMBUS, Ind., March 27, 2025--Accelera™ by Cummins, the zero-emissions business segment of Cummins Inc. [NYSE: CMI], and Isuzu Motors Limited will introduce a new battery electric powertrain for the F-series medium-duty truck at this year’s ACT Expo in Anaheim, California. Scheduled for production in 2027, the fully integrated powertrain will feature Accelera's next-generation battery, eAxle, accessories and controls, and offer customers an innovative and versatile solution to fleet decarboniz
